conversation_history.content:
Assalamu Alaikum! As-salamu alaykum! Mehwish Chat AI 3.0 ki taraf se khush amdeed! (Hello! Welcome to Mehwish Chat AI 3.0!)

Main aap ki kisi bhi sawaal ka jawab dena chahti hoon. Kya aap koi khass topic par baat karna chahte hain ya koi general information chahte hain? (I'm here to answer any question you have. Would you like to discuss a specific topic or seek general information?)
